name: Abstract01
description:
Abstract01 - Marius Watz, 2003

Still from interactive drawing tool written in Processing in 2003. Created for the Abstraction Now exhibition at Künstlerhaus, Vienna. In 2010, I made a Javascript port using processing.js before it was ultimately rewritten in p5.js.

I have used Processing as my primary creative tool since 2003, and all that time the Processing community has been critical to my work as an artist.

4959x7000px PNG, edition of 25+2 AP. 
Minted for the 20th Anniversary of Processing, August 20-22, 2021.
